Participation
Class Discount

java.lang.Object
  Participation.Discount
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Discount_1000, Discount_5pack
public abstract class Discount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

An object of this class represents a 'discount token'. A customer may be awarded with discount tokens. Each token is only applicable under a certain condition. At the end of the day, applicable tokens will be applied, and consumed.

Note that this class is abstract. To implement a certain discount scheme, we still need a concrete subclass implementing the scheme.

See also the background provided in ApplicationLogic.

See Also:
